meta.title: Contact Us - Autyvo
meta.description: Need technical help or information? Contact the Autyvo team

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Need technical help or information? Choose the right service for a tailored response

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: Problem with the app? Bug or malfunction?
support.hours: Available Monday to Friday from 9am to 6pm

help.title: Need help?
help.description: Check our FAQ or online help center for quick answers.

items.question: What are the support hours?
items.answer: Our support team is available Monday to Friday from 9am to 6pm. We usually respond within 24 hours.

items.question: How can I modify my information?
items.answer: You can modify your information directly in the app, in the "Account Settings" section.

items.question: Is the app available on Android and iOS?
items.answer: Yes, AUTYVO is available for free on iOS and Android.

items.question: How do I report a technical issue?
items.answer: Use the form above and select "Technical support" as the subject, or contact us directly by email.
